meta_title: Overhaul Meaning in Maintenance: The Zero-Hour Reset
meta_description: Understand the true overhaul meaning in industrial maintenance. Learn the difference between repair and refurbishment, calculate TBO, and maximize asset ROI.
title: Overhaul Meaning in Maintenance: Resetting the Clock on Industrial Assets

Another technician (male) is inspecting a schematic on a tablet (back of tablet visible only). The third is organizing parts on a clean, organized workbench in the background.
